head.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files via {{EnvName}}
head.description: Integrate {{FileFormatUp}} document merging into your {{EnvNameShort}} projects with {{ProdFullName}}.

header.title: Merge {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to create powerful {{EnvNameShort}} applications that seamlessly merge and manage {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced document processing solution that supports over 50 file formats, including PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and archives. Easily merge, split, extract, reorder, and remove pages as needed.

more_features.title: Document merging tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} works with more than 50 widely used business file formats, providing extensive document processing capabilities.

feature_1.title: Merge different document formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and other file types. Choose specific pages to include in the merge process.

feature_2.title: Page manipulation
feature_2.content: Rearrange, remove, or swap pages to organize documents according to your needs.

feature_3.title: Adjust page appearance
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle and switch between landscape and portrait mode for supported formats.

feature_4.title: Extract pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract specific pages to create a new file or document.

formats.title: Merge various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports more than 50 file formats, enabling efficient document merging and processing.

examples.comment_2: Merge the document with another file
examples.comment_3: Save the merged file to the desired location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to merge {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Add merging functionality to your {{EnvName}} applications and combine multiple files effortlessly.
content.step_1: Define the path to the first {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Choose the second file to merge.
content.step_3: Apply additional merge settings if necessary.
content.step_4: Execute the merge operation and save the output file.

code_1.title: Merge files of different formats
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to merge multiple files of various supported formats into a single document.
code_1.comment_2: Merge it with a Microsoft Word document
code_1.comment_3: Add a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet to the merged file
code_1.comment_4: Save the merged document to the specified location
